name: series_get_stats
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cricbuzz_cricket.
Tool description: This API helps to query for live cricket scores, commentary, latest cricket news and editorials, schedules of upcoming matches, rankings, stats, records, etc
API description: Fetches statistical data for a given cricket series from the Cricbuzz API.

seriesid.description: The ID of the series for which statistics are to be retrieved. This ID is typically obtained from the series list or series list-archives endpoints.

statstype.description: The type of statistics to retrieve. This value is obtained from the series/get-stats-filter endpoint.
